def: The set of rules that overs the way society operates. Another word for Laws
An hourly rate of pay which is set by government. All employees above a certain age must receive at least this pay
Treating one person differently from another without having good reasons to do so.
Working for a proportion of the working week - for example three days rather than all five
A group of works who act together to improve their pay and working conditions
A legal document state the hours - rates of pay - duties and other conditions under which a person is employed.
The range of factors that influence the way a person behaves at work
Laws that have been introduced to prevent businesses from treating their customers unfairly
